programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: SEVE - Artista, Lutador, Lenda
programme.desc: Seve continua a ser uma lenda, um campeão multi-major, o homem responsável por fazer da moderna Ryder Cup um grande acontecimento. A sua paixão pelo golfe era tal que ainda criança esgueirava no campo para jogar à noite, futuramente faria o mesmo num esforço "para encontrar a magia". A sua história é contada por membros da sua família e do seu círculo interno, por outros grandes desportistas e através do material recentemente descoberto. É um conto hipnotizante de talento, crença e bravura - a história da vida de Seve… e da sua morte.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Tenerife | La Palma
programme.desc: A aventura continua em Tenerife, com uma primeira prova que terá os impressionantes Acantilados de los Gigantes como pano de fundo e um catamarã e uma corrida de estafetas em caiaques como protagonistas para obter o máximo de "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. As equipas poderão obter mais objetos na Candelaria, no seu Conjunto Monumental de los Menceyes e na misteriosa Cueva del Viento. Uma nova surpresa final espera aí pelas equipas...

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Gomera | El Hierro
programme.desc: A viagem continua em La Gomera, com uma primeira prova no frondoso Parque Nacional de Garajonay, onde terão de mostrar como se conseguem orientar às cegas para obter "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. Daí, "saltarão" para o Valle Gran Rey para fazer outro tipo de salto, o salto do pastor, uma técnica utilizada pelos antigos habitantes da ilha para se deslocarem em terrenos montanhosos, que lhes permitirá obter mais "objetos". Tudo o que foi conquistado pelos participantes será posto em jogo na Playa del Inglés, onde a força e a coordenação de cada equipa serão fundamentais no final desta etapa.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: Ride your Dream
programme.desc: Motociclismo era um mundo de homens, até agora. Este documentário apresenta-nos a Ana Carrasco, a piloto espanhola que revolucionou o mundo das duas rodas e que, desde cedo, teve um sonho claro: ser campeã mundial. Por meio de conversas íntimas com a sua familia e equipa, conhecemos as motivações de Ana, os obstáculos que enfrentou e os sonhos que continua a perseguir. A sua carreira, desde as suas origens numa pequena cidade em Murcia a ser a primeira mulher a vencer um Campeonato do Mundo, é fonte de inspiração para qualquer pessoa.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Na capa - Queens
programme.desc: Neste empolgante primeiro episódio do concurso de maquilhagem, conhecemos os oito concorrentes, que se enfrentarão ao desafio de criar maquilhagem editorial à altura de uma capa de revista. Conheceremos o júri: David Molina, um dos mais famosos maquilhadores do setor; e Camila Redondo, uma das vozes mais influentes no mundo online da beleza e maquilhagem. E a rainha indiscutível do TikTok, Lola Lolita, visitará os concorrentes. Não percas este novo concurso brilhante e com muito estilo.

programme.title: Episódios 3-4
programme.desc: A maldição | Os Vizinhos

programme.title: Episódios 7-8
programme.desc: A Tormenta de 18 Dias | Um Novo Começo

programme.title: Safety123
programme.desc: Vistos de longe, os Alpes podem parecer uma fantasia pitoresca, mas quem vive no sopé sabe como podem ser ameaçadores.

programme.title: Ettore Bassi: Stage and Race
programme.desc: O ator italiano Ettore Bassi é conhecido pelo seu trabalho no cinema, televisão e teatro. Mas nem todos sabem que também é um piloto profissional de corridas de rampa. A sua vida divide-se com frequência entre as duas paixões e dois cenários muito diferentes: o palco ou a pista. Em 2022, as duas realidades chocam quando tem agendados um espetáculo e uma corrida, em lados opostos da Itália. Bassi decide dedicar-se aos dois projetos, sabendo que o sucesso é quase impossível. A sua escolha e determinação revelam muito acerca do homem e do seu passado...

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 1 - 2
programme.desc: No primeiro episódio, para se apresentarem aos jurados, os participantes usam a sua capacidade de engenho para criar um visual livre e solto. O único limite é a sua capacidade criativa. Também serão avaliados quanto a cinco técnicas de cabeleireiro essenciais; o último classificado será eliminado. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Tina Leung irá visitar o salão para revelar a sua rotina de cuidado capilar e oferecer algumas dicas valiosas.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A vencedora de três medalhas olímpicas e Treinadora Feminina do Ano de 2012 da FIFA Pia Sundhage conta-nos como se sentiu quando foi convocada pela primeira vez pela seleção nacional feminina sueca. Pia acredita que o futebol lhe ofereceu um modo de vida. Pia conversa com Stina Blackstenius, vencedora de uma medalha de bronze na Copa do Mundo Feminina da FIFA e vencedora de duas medalhas de prata em Jogos Olímpicos, e com Molly Johansson, ambas jogadoras do BK Häcken. Stina conversa com as duas jogadoras sobre o que sentiu quando participou nos Jogos Olímpicos, e como jogar em França a tornou mais forte, enquanto Molly revela as suas metas para o futuro.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Episódios 1-2
programme.desc: Um Clássico de Futebol | Território Inimigo

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Gomera | El Hierro
programme.desc: A viagem continua em La Gomera, com uma primeira prova no frondoso Parque Nacional de Garajonay, onde terão de mostrar como se conseguem orientar às cegas para obter "objetos" que serão decisivos no desenvolvimento do episódio. Daí, "saltarão" para o Valle Gran Rey para fazer outro tipo de salto, o salto do pastor, uma técnica utilizada pelos antigos habitantes da ilha para se deslocarem em terrenos montanhosos, que lhes permitirá obter mais "objetos". Tudo o que foi conquistado pelos participantes será posto em jogo na Playa del Inglés, onde a força e a coordenação de cada equipa serão fundamentais no final desta etapa.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Liderada por Rafa Nadal, a seleção espanhola era a favorita deste ano até sofrer um sério revés. O jogador número dois da equipa, Roberto Bautista, teve de deixar a disputa para voltar à sua cidade natal e ficar ao lado do pai nas últimas horas da sua vida. Sem o Bautista, Nadal e Feliciano López conseguiram heroicamente levar a equipa à final. Mas então veio a notícia que emocionou os fãs de ténis em todo o mundo: Bautista, após o funeral do seu pai, está de volta à competição e pronto para jogar. Unidos mais uma vez, os espanhóis lutam pela vitória na grande final, onde algo muito além do ténis está em jogo.

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1980!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1980
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1980
programme.desc: Hits & Headlines from the year of the Rubik Cube, the Post-It Note, and when the USA voted for a movie star as President!

programme.title: On The Edge Of 1980!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 On The Edge Of 1980!
programme.desc: Queen, The Clash, Pink Floyd, Police, Pretenders & more all featured on the final Top 40 chart of 1979, and were all still in there as 1980 began!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1980!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1980!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's US No.1s of 1980
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's US No.1s of 1980
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back US chart toppers from 1980 - some you might know well, some you might not! Including Captain & Tennille, Christopher Cross & Kenny Rogers.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1980!

programme.title: 1980's One-Hit-Wonders! Top 10

programme.title: Simon Bates New Golden Hour: 1980
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates New Golden Hour: 1980
programme.desc: Hits & Headlines from the year of Barbara Woodhouse, Button Moon & Metal Mickey, and when Steven Gerrard was born as Liverpool were crowned football league champions!

programme.title: Way Back When! 1980
programme.desc: 60 minutes of lesser heard hits from 1980. Including AC/DC, Stray Cats, Jermaine Jackson, Gary Numan, Donna Summer & Gilbert O'Sullivan.

programme.title: Gary Davies: Video Hall of Fame!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Gary Davies: Video Hall of Fame!

programme.title: 1989 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1989!

programme.title: The Heritage Chart 4th Birthday!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The Heritage Chart 4th Birthday!
programme.desc: Celebrating the 4th anniversary of the Heritage Chart - Mike Read welcomes a whole host of famous guests to sing their classic hits on TV - one more time!

programme.title: Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.desc: Before the CD, the perfect pop songs were spun by singers & bands on 7 inch vinyl. From 1980-1984 these were the classic UK hits that invaded the world!

programme.title: Timmy Mallett's Brilliant Bands!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Timmy Mallett's Brilliant Bands!
programme.desc: Timmy's back with something a little different - a run through of his favourite 80s bands, many interviewed on his "Timmy On The Tranny" radio show throughout the decade!

programme.title: Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Best Played at 45 RPM!
programme.desc: Before the CD, the perfect pop songs were spun by singers & bands on 7 inch vinyl. From 1980-1984 these were the classic UK hits that invaded the world!

programme.title: Alternative 80s! with Wayne Hussey
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Alternative 80s! with Wayne Hussey
programme.desc: The Mission's gobby frontman with big, bold & ambitious 80s sounds that offered a true alternative to the ever present cheesy pop fare. From Joy Divison in 1980 to Electronic in 89

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1977
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1977 - a year when David Soul & disco were kings! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Novelty Number 1s! 1970-1979
programme.desc: They came out of nowhere and conquered the UK charts. This is one hour of unexpected chart toppers from Lee Marvin & Telly Savalas to Benny Hill & The Wurzels!

programme.title: Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: Our most complete list yet of UK number 1s of the decade! Some songs just don't have videos, but 141 chart toppers do, and here they are - in order!

programme.title: All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.desc: All day - a choice selection of the 168 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1970s!

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1970
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1970
programme.desc: 60 minutes of back to back 1970 number 1s - from Simon & Garfunkel and Elvis Presley to Lee Marvin & Freda Payne. With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Every No.1 of the 70s!
programme.desc: Our most complete list yet of UK number 1s of the decade! Some songs just don't have videos, but 141 chart toppers do, and here they are - in order!

programme.title: All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 All Day - They Hit The Top Spot!
programme.desc: All day - a choice selection of the 168 singles that reached the top of the UK charts in the 1970s!

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.desc: Simon Bates with a celebration of a decade - the 50 biggest pure pop hits of the 70s. He's got a bucketload of Boney M, oodles of the Osmonds & an armful of Abba!

programme.title: Reasons To Be Cheerful!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Reasons To Be Cheerful!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Did They Really Do That? Top 30
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Did They Really Do That? Top 30
programme.desc: 30 fabulously great, but awful, chart hits & videos - all with that certain cringe factor attached. Did they really do that? They certainly did!

programme.title: Great Song - Stupid Title! 1970-79
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 Great Song - Stupid Title! 1970-79
programme.desc: Robin Banks with 30 amazing songs, 30 nonsense titles! Fancy a Dreadlock Holiday or a drive down the 2468 Motorway? This is where to come!

programme.title: Retro Rewind! 70s Edition
programme.desc: From hippies to punk rockers, via folk, funk, soul & disco - these are the classic songs that made the 70s!

programme.title: Sing It Loud! 1970-1979
programme.desc: These are the greatest floor-filling party tracks of the 70s. Every tune an absolute belter, hand picked by the NOW 70s team for you. Turn it up!

programme.title: The 50s Revival! Top 25
programme.desc: They say music goes in cycles - well for a period in the 70s we decided to celebrate all things 50s! Showaddywaddy's Dave Bartram has hits from Alvin Stardust, Mud, Darts & Grease!

programme.title: 1977 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1977!

programme.title: Me & You & A Dog Named Boo! Top 12

programme.desc: From a 'Horse With No Name' to a 'Dog Named Boo' - 12 songs about animals, or by artists with animal connections. Pretty contrived but quite good fun.

programme.title: Sensational 70s!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Total Legends! 1970-1979

programme.title: The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.sub-title: S00 : E00 The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Tony Blackburn's 70s Soul!
programme.desc: Slick ballads, funky beats & soulful disco - Tony has the lot in a 2 hour session of sensational 70s soul!

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Crooners

programme.title: Essentials! 70s Rock Groups
programme.desc: Turn it up loud for 2 hours of proper rock from the 70s - the decade that gave birth to Prog & Metal! Including Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, Black Sabbath, Alice Cooper, AC/DC & Queen

programme.desc: The Clubbing TV team is exploring the world to understand the different sides of the club culture. Interviews, art exhibitions, parties and backstage access with the biggest artists will be part of the trip!

programme.title: Rendez-vous
programme.desc: Interviews with the world's famous DJs and producers. Clubbing TV meets with talents of all genres: Big Room stars or underground heroes, legendary or upcoming artist, we got them all on Clubbing TV !

programme.title: The Big Bad Box
programme.desc: Our brand new studio show The Big Bad Box will kick off the season this month! One studio, one screen, one guest and 13 minutes to get to know better your favorite artists.

programme.title: Put Your Hands Up
programme.desc: Our reports and aftermovies from electronic music festivals all over the world. Our Clubbing TV teams are travelling all over the world to guide you through those amazing party spots ! Interviews with DJs, clubbers and event organizers, there is no escape from our cameras !

programme.title: Licence to Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Blind Date and Garlic
programme.desc: The girls set Robs lifelong bachelor buddy up on a blind date and Rob decides to bbq mega garlic. Grilled veggies with garlic anchovy dip, grilled trout wrapped in Proscuitto with a roasted garlic mayo and a fresh nicoise salad. Will love blossom in a wake of garlic breath?

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Collard Greens, Maple Syrup, Goat Cheddar and Heirloom Cherry Tomatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera prepares a frittata, rosemary skewer chicken and grilled bread salad with fresh ingredients from a local farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Broccoli, Rainbow Chard and Herbs
programme.desc: Warm host Amanda Herrera picks up colourful produce and herbs at a farmers' market to make a delicious appetizer and tasty cold oil French fries.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Hold your Horse"...shoes! Rob hosts his annual Horseshoe BBQ tournament, and grills up a southern feast. He and his ring of friends devour delicious smoked rotisserie pig, lemon ginger chicken drumsticks and roasted peppers stuffed with corn.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's Rob's turn to host the annual gourmet dinner. He heats up the grill and pulls together a delicious roasted tomato soup, grilled fillet mignon, sweet blue cheese stuffed pears, and some gourmet salads, and sides.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team "drop in" on a group of thrill seeking skydivers at a Skydiving Jamboree. They let the BBQs rip and grill up three different kinds of wings - smoked, jerked and 'suicide hot'. Then they cool things down with an asparagus cucumber salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team put the pedal to the metal at the Go Kart Track. They crank up the heat on the grills and pull out all the stops making Summertime Pizza, Sticky BBQ Chicken, Smoked Turkey Pastrami Sandwiches and a Summer Mellon Ball Salad.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: This episode kicks off with Spencer's tasty Grilled Caesar Salad. He skillfully piles of char-grilled romaine lettuce wedges and sourdough croutons are topped with tangy dressing, crispy pancetta, and shards of a homemade parmesan tuile. For his next recipe, Spencer whips up Grilled Zucchini Boats that filled with fresh ingredients including orzo pasta, summer veggies, and herbs. Chef Watts loves a good steak and his Grilled Cauliflower Steak is not one to be passed up! Dusted in Middle Eastern Spices, flame roasted and served with chili-spiked, Yemeni 'Skhug' hot sauce and pomegranate seeds. Finally, Spencer steams tender artichokes, stuffing these flowers with breadcrumbs and...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's friend has just accepted a job to teach English in Japan. As a sendoff Rob is preparing an Asian Feast on the grill - juicy slow rotisserie duck, seared fresh tuna and smoked asian veggies. It's a bon voyage dinner she certainly won't forget!

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's favourite movie of all time is The Godfather. In a tribute to this great film he and his friends gather for an Italian feast off the grill before heading inside to watch the movie. Rob prepares a grilled vegetable pasta sauce, spicy Italian sausage, grilled veal chops and delicious calamari.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a day of great BBQ. Inspired by the aerial acrobatics of CF18's and Harvards, Matt cooks up a variety of poultry and fowl. The menu: Bacon Wrapped Quail Stuffed with 3 Cream Cheeses, Raspberry Chipotle Turkey Wings, Grilled Balsamic Marinated Duck Breast, and Deviled Eggs.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Whether you're a pro or a beginner, everyone is welcome to join the Road Grill team at the 19th tee where Matt is busy burnin' up his Q's. What better way to end your day at the links with an enticing menu of Miso Citrus Grilled Sablefish, Smoked Rack of Pork with a Sour Cherry Sauce , Lemon Basil Smashed Potatoes with Mushrooms, Arugula Salad with Peaches, and Blue Cheese and Walnuts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob demonstrates how to do chicken up with style on the grill. He and his friends enjoy a poultry feast with BBQ rotisserie chicken, grilled flattened chicken and delicious smoked sides.

programme.title: Licence to Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Blind Date and Garlic
programme.desc: The girls set Robs lifelong bachelor buddy up on a blind date and Rob decides to bbq mega garlic. Grilled veggies with garlic anchovy dip, grilled trout wrapped in Proscuitto with a roasted garlic mayo and a fresh nicoise salad. Will love blossom in a wake of garlic breath?

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clam, Risotto, Potatoes, and Salmon
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, clams and artichoke! Next, radicchio risotto. Followed by an Arabic twist on baked potatoes! Finishing with a BC roasted salmon!

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob demonstrates how to do chicken up with style on the grill. He and his friends enjoy a poultry feast with BBQ rotisserie chicken, grilled flattened chicken and delicious smoked sides.

programme.title: Licence to Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Blind Date and Garlic
programme.desc: The girls set Robs lifelong bachelor buddy up on a blind date and Rob decides to bbq mega garlic. Grilled veggies with garlic anchovy dip, grilled trout wrapped in Proscuitto with a roasted garlic mayo and a fresh nicoise salad. Will love blossom in a wake of garlic breath?

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Honeycomb, Shallots and Iceberg Lettuce
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms fresh market ingredients into two irresistible dishes, including a one pot Lamb Curry with Honeycomb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Patty Pan Summer Squash and Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera grills up two dinner recipes using patty pan summer squash and cabbage that she picked up from the market.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is born to be wild - Hog Wild that is! Rob and his motorcycle riding friends cruise the streets for charity then head back to Rob's for the post parade party. The hungry bikers don't rebel when he serves up a picnic pork roast, funky potato packages, tamarind shrimp, plus sauces and sides galore.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Taste of India Celebration
programme.desc: Tales from Rob's friend of his adventures in India entice Rob to grill up an Indian flavored feast. He puts together spicy mouth-watering dishes like lobster tails in curry butter, roasted curried potatoes, decadent lamb steaks and a carrot salad to help cool things down.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team to cook up a midsummer feast. Leg of Lamb with Summer Herbs, Rosemary Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Wild Berry Sauce, Grilled Trout with Peaches, and a Tomato Salad have the locals raiding the market to stay stocked on the season's best.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Road Grill Team spend the day playing around the Water Park. The Spit Roasted Lemon-Lime Butter Chicken, Grilled Swordfish Skewers with Caribbean Salsa, and Smokey Spareribs with BBQ Sauce result in a big splash with this pool loving crowd.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Caribbean Bon Voyage Fiesta
programme.desc: In honour of Rob's neighbors' grand prize win of all expenses paid cruise to the Caribbean, Rob prepares a Caribbean Feast. Smoked Pork loin in a passion fruit applesauce, jerk snapper and island salsa are all on his menu as the celebration begins in his backyard.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a wine & cheese party with a bunch of his closest friends. From the lamb chops to the lobster tails - he combines the wine and cheese into every element of the delicious grilled menu

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: In between hoisting sails and scrubbing the deck, Matt and his team prepare a feast for the sailors before going on a long voyage. Not only is the weather perfect for sailing, it's perfect for BBQing! The menu: Scallop Corn Bacon Burger, Maple-apple Brined Pork Chops, Grilled Tuna Bruschetta, and Strawberry Marscapone Trifle.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Teddy Bears of all age, shape, and size join our grill team with their owners for a day of games, rides and some teddy bear repair. Matt & the RG team are BBQing a menu even the pickiest eater will love. The menu: Grilled Almond Butter & Banana Sandwiches, Grilled Meatball Sub, Smoked White Cheddar Macaroni, and Quick & Snappy Ginger Lemon Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: New neighbors move in across the street all the way from Southern Italy and Rob decides to do an all-Mediterranean bbq dinner in their honour. Hot of the grill are octopus, sardines and Moroccan lamb kabobs along with some mouthwatering sides that will make his guests feel right at home.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's karaoke night at Robs place. That means lots of bad singing and lots of great food. It's a ribapolooza! Rob bbqs some smoked spareribs, spicy beef short ribs and fresh grilled veg for his wanna be stars.

Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Caribbean Bon Voyage Fiesta
programme.desc: In honour of Rob's neighbors' grand prize win of all expenses paid cruise to the Caribbean, Rob prepares a Caribbean Feast. Smoked Pork loin in a passion fruit applesauce, jerk snapper and island salsa are all on his menu as the celebration begins in his backyard.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having a wine & cheese party with a bunch of his closest friends. From the lamb chops to the lobster tails - he combines the wine and cheese into every element of the delicious grilled menu

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: In between hoisting sails and scrubbing the deck, Matt and his team prepare a feast for the sailors before going on a long voyage. Not only is the weather perfect for sailing, it's perfect for BBQing! The menu: Scallop Corn Bacon Burger, Maple-apple Brined Pork Chops, Grilled Tuna Bruschetta, and Strawberry Marscapone Trifle.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Teddy Bears of all age, shape, and size join our grill team with their owners for a day of games, rides and some teddy bear repair. Matt & the RG team are BBQing a menu even the pickiest eater will love. The menu: Grilled Almond Butter & Banana Sandwiches, Grilled Meatball Sub, Smoked White Cheddar Macaroni, and Quick & Snappy Ginger Lemon Ice Cream Sandwiches.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: New neighbors move in across the street all the way from Southern Italy and Rob decides to do an all-Mediterranean bbq dinner in their honour. Hot of the grill are octopus, sardines and Moroccan lamb kabobs along with some mouthwatering sides that will make his guests feel right at home.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's karaoke night at Robs place. That means lots of bad singing and lots of great food. It's a ribapolooza! Rob bbqs some smoked spareribs, spicy beef short ribs and fresh grilled veg for his wanna be stars.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when it's grilled to perfection

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Sweden, Mexico, Senegal, Italy
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by Sweden - Swedish Turnips and Granola, Mexico - Radicchio Tacos, Senegal - Cashew-Sweeth Potato Maafe, and Italy - Bok Choy Fusili!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 South Africa, Iceland, Bangladesh, Spain
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by South Africa - Braaied Rapini, Iceland - Cold Icelandic Pepper Soup, Bangladesh - Edamame Jhalmuri, and Spain - Spanish Broccoli Tortilla!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 India, Belgium, Italy, China
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by India - Bhindi Masala-Style Nopales, Belgium - Belgian Plantain Waffles, Italy - Almond Crusted Portobellos, and China - Sichuan Artichoke Stir Fry!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 USA, Vietnam, Spain, India
programme.desc: Join chef Pino Di Cerbo in the Global Veggies kitchen as he creates veggie dishes inspired by the USA - Scalloped Cassava Casserole, Vietnam - Pear Summer Rolls, Spain - Hempseed Romesco with Leeks, and India - Potato Biryani Hash!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on spicy sauces! First up, a Cajun comeback sauce for soft-shelled crab! Next, a classic steakhouse mustard sauce and a ginger caramel sauce for ginger caramel apples!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on wine sauces! First up, a classic veal marsala! Next, a white wine chicken gravy and a port sabayon with grapes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on sour sauces! First a brown butter picatta sauce for chicken picatta! Next, a smoked tomato ponzu sauce for fried oysters and a duo of orange marmalade and lemon curd for crepes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on veggie sauces! First up, a Provencal sauce tomate to go with halibut! Next, a rustic pepperonata with flank steak and a trio of pestos!

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Honey, Cherries, Garlic Scapes and Carrots
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera transforms market fresh honey, cherries, garlic scapes and carrots into two simple chic sides and an irresistible dessert.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Sprouts, Veggies and Potatoes
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera creates two summer fresh salads and a hearty breakfast using sprouts, potatoes and leafy lambs quarters.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kohlrabi, Fennel, Kale and Red Cabbage
programme.desc: Host Amanda Herrera shows us why fresh is always best with two creative dishes using ingredients from the farmers' market.

programme.title: Fresh Market Dinners
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raspberries, Mint, Peas and Apricot
programme.desc: Zestful cook Amanda Herrera scoops up raspberries, peas, mint, and apricots to use in three summer recipes.

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on salty, funky sauces! First up, a gorgonzola-prosciutto-orange wine pasta sauce! Next, a grape and olive tapenade to go with quail and sauce brandade for potatoes!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on sweet sauces! First up, a grown-up sundae with classic chocolate sauce! Next, a caramelized onion soubise for pork chops and a traditional sweet and sour chicken sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on bitter sauces! First up, a duo of chimichurris - one with black garlic! Next, a stout and espresso gravy for lamb and a traditional Georgian walnut sauce!

programme.title: The Wizard Of Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford pulls back the curtain on fatty sauces! First up, patatas bravas with aioli and brava sauce! Next, classic sauce choron on crab cakes and a duck fat-blood orange emulsion with duck confit!

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of sardines and caponata on crostini, chicken legs with sausage and peppers, pecorino smashed potatoes, and fennel and orange salad.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of grilled asparagus with a 63 degree egg, farro succotash, sous-vide pork tenderloin with blueberry sauce, and a no bake blueberry cheesecake.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of braised oxtail and plantain waffles, Turkish eggs with spiced yogurt, grilled broccolini, and plum parfait with gluten-free granola.

programme.title: MORE One Big Recipe
programme.desc: Re-join Chef Kimberly Lallouz in her One Big Recipe test kitchen as she masterfully creates a week night feast of Swiss chard and pea salad with green apple vinaigrette, broccoli and cheddar soup, salt crusted lamb loin with lamb gravy, and a green apple panna cotta with crispy cheddar frico.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 How to Roast a Duck - Thai Style
programme.desc: Who doesn't love tender, juicy duck? Host Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how to roast a delicious duck, Thai-style.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Flavours of the Sea
programme.desc: Host Natalia Machado knows that cooking fish and seafood in Argentina means simple ingredients to let the natural flavours shine!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 It's All About the Olive Oil
programme.desc: The greatest staple of Italian cuisine? Olive oil! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco uses olive oil to make delightful Italian dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen features dishes like Japanese Chicken Wings and Chawanmushi for a lovely feast.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Here's a tongue twister: Theresa, tuna, tangerine! In this episode, host Theresa Visintin picks her favourite letter, "T," and introduces us to scrumptious recipes using tuna and tangerine. Theresa loves tuna and Italian cuisine, so naturally she combines both to create a mouth-watering pasta with some savoury tomato, olive, and tuna sauce. Next, Theresa satisfies her sweet tooth with a decadent tangerine parfait! Using the sweet juice of the tangerine, Theresa creates gelatin, with a hint of orange liqueur. She tops it all off by whipping up a fluffy cream to complete this sweet treat. Then it's time for a real challenge: tuna and tangerine in one recipe!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "H" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to take on the unique flavours of halibut and horseradish. She starts with a perfectly prepared prosciutto wrapped halibut, pairing the buttery flavour of the fish with the saltiness of the cured meat. Throw in some dill potatoes and you've got a beautifully balanced dish. Next up, Chef Lauren show us how to make a delightful roast beef dip with a zesty horseradish sauce using carrots, vinegar, mayo and a little lemon. Finally, she is challenged to make a dish that combines both ingredients, and does she ever deliver!

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this letter "P" challenge, Chef Robert Jewell showcases his vegetarian skills using pecans and peppers. Despite his cowboy roots, Robert shows us he can kick it with vegetarians by cooking up a juicy meatless "meatloaf" using pecans. But, no "meatloaf" would be complete without a gravy! Robert fries up earthy portobello mushrooms before adding a special ingredient to thicken the gravy, you guessed it -- pecans! Now, on to peppers. Robert doubles up, using both the vegetable and seasoning, to make a delicious red pepper coulis with herb and pepper crusted beef tenderloin. Robert goes a little nuts when he prepares his final recipe using both pecans and peppers.

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pancakes, Lobster Soup, Duck, and Flan
programme.desc: Chef Kyle Crawford unveils four spellbinding dishes! First up, wild rice pancakes! Next, lobster-lime soup! Followed by a Tuscan porchetta-style duck! Finishing with a flan with port-soaked cherries!

programme.desc: BLITZ! is an all-new cooking show! Imagine being next Erica Karbelnik as they cook their fav dishes!

programme.desc: We do something that has never been done before: build two identical 496 Big Block Chevy engines to run on the dyno...at the SAME TIME!!

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: Today, it's do or die. We connect TWO 496 Big Block Chevy engines to the dyno to find out exactly how much power two of the same engine will make running in tandem!

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We're turning our 1964 Ford Flatbed into a shop truck! With the help of the team in Engine Power, the guys make an engine swap that includes a turbo! Plus we're off to the junkyard in search of a transmission.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: The Carcass crew gives you some tips on how to repair rusty trouble spots and remove dents on your project. Then we'll walk you through getting it ready for primer.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: The '69 Road Runner gets an exterior upgrade. We'll show you some unorthodox methods for enhancing a patina paint look.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Our '69 Road Runner, nicknamed Road Burner, gets a big bump in power when we perform a Gen III Hemi engine swap.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: We start working on a new project with the novice racer in mind. We take a 2008 Ford Crown Vic Police Cruiser and turn it into a budget-friendly Spec Panther racing machine! Today we'll upgrade our transmission for better shifting and give the old power plant a tune-up.

programme.title: Carcass
programme.desc: The Carcass builders bring in an old 1984 Chevrolet Land Yacht to give it some custom touches for some family fun. They will tear down and clean up 40 years of dirt, then start replacing worn out suspension parts to get this wagon road worthy.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: We take Hard Charger to the Mopar Nationals in Ohio to give it a final shakedown, then we try to decide our next project vehicle.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: The Dodge got a serious HP boost. Now, it gets the suspension, brakes, and tires it needs to succeed on the track!

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: The supercharged big block Blazer hits the trails in search of a big mud hole.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Our host travels to Sintra, known for its castles and palaces. Learning and exploring about castles, he further travels to the historic town Obidos.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Great World Hotels Desroches 1
programme.desc: Seychelles is a country of pristine white sandy beaches and turquoise waters that harbour colourful coral reefs and bountiful marine life. Travel enthusiast, Freishia Bomanbehram comes to this tropical paradise looking for fun and relaxation. As she tucks into fresh seafood, goes snorkeling and tries out some catch and release fishing, she realizes that Seychelles has ruined her for all other beach holidays.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan, and visit its source.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek travels to Coimbra. Where he visits the Santa Cruz Church, a park and Santa Claire monastery. Concluding with a visit to Coimbra University.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: From the swords of the Samurai to hidden Christian churches, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty get to know some intriguing sides to Japan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Heritage Agra, India
programme.desc: Travel back in time and explore the monuments and architecture built by the Mughals such as the Taj Mahal and Agra Fort in Agra and Fatehpur Sikri Fort in Fatehpur Sikhri.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack Duoro Valley, Portugal
programme.desc: Our host travels to Douro Valley and is seen exploring vineyards and learning about the history behind it. Concluding his journey at Troia and Évora.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Bucket List Sakurajima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try different ways to get up, close and personal with Sakurajima, a fuming volcano in Kyushu.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: Heritage
programme.desc: Located in the ceremonial county of Wiltshire in southwestern England is the prehistoric Stonehenge Avebury. A 'Henge monument'... Stonehenge literally means 'menhirs' or upright monumental stones

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: How does a simple town square transform into the timeless symbol of a city's soul? Watch the story of London’s iconic Trafalgar Square to find out.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E40 Best From The Rest Ethiopian Experiences
programme.desc: Ethiopia, the country where mankind has its roots, where the Blue Nile has its source and where human beings first woke up and smelled the coffee, is truly a land of life-affirming experiences. Here is a guide to the top five enriching experiences in this ancient and often overlooked African destination that will nourish your soul.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore Japan’s very own Venice. They also see a garden that is straight out of a fantasy.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Great World Hotels Desroches 2
programme.desc: Seychelles, with its idyllic natural beauty and slow-paced life is the perfect destination to commune with nature. When Freishia visits this cluster of jewels in the Indian Ocean, she chances upon a tortoise feeding pen and her conversation with the team there gives her insights into the efforts taken by the Island Conservation Society to preserve the beauty of Seychelles.

programme.desc: Driek today travels to Porto, surrounded by chapela, monasteries and churches. He visits a Wine cellar and learns about wine production of Portugal.

programme.desc: A stunning contrast of deserts, mountains and beaches, its unspoilt landscape, dotted with grand forts, exquisite palaces, undulating dunes, canyons and lush wadis.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Once an ancient city on the famous Silk Road, Tashkent is a kaleidoscope of mesmerizing art, delectable food, sweeping gardens and eye-catching architecture. Renowned traveller, Alex Outhwaite explores the Uzbekistan capital, where she visits iconic sights such as the Barak-Khan Madrassah, learns about the city’s history, and tries out some local delicacies such as sheesh kebab, horse milk and horse meat.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Larnaca in Cyprus is one of the world’s 20 most ancient, continuously inhabited cities for the last 4000 years. Travel enthusiast, Sabrina sets out to find out more about the city but is waylaid when she finds a flock of flamingos at a lake side.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bucket List Fukuoka, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty attend a unique baseball game at a rather offbeat stadium in Kyushu’s largest city, Fukuoka.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Join our host as he starts his backpacking journey of Portugal, starting from Lisbon. Exploring important monuments from Belem tower to Portas Do Sol.

programme.title: Backpack

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty enjoy treks to waterfalls, fishing and a serene beach sunset in Itoshima - a place in Kyushu which calms the soul.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Samarkand, one of the most popular cities of Uzbekistan, is a city littered with monuments, which span a thousand years of history. programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: A stunning contrast of deserts, mountains and beaches, its unspoilt landscape, dotted with grand forts, exquisite palaces, undulating dunes, canyons and lush wadis.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.desc: Sri Lanka's dalliance with history is legendary and Gal Vihara is simply another jewel in its jewel-studded crown. This rock temple is a carver's most divine dream. It radiates beauty and intricacy.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Samarkand, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: Samarkand, one of the most popular cities of Uzbekistan, is a city littered with monuments, which span a thousand years of history. From the stories of the Silk Road to the life of the legendary king, Timur, Alex Outhwaite learns about the long, rich history of Samarkand through some of its iconic attractions.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bucket List Itoshima, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty enjoy treks to waterfalls, fishing and a serene beach sunset in Itoshima - a place in Kyushu which calms the soul.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Our host travels to Sintra, known for its castles and palaces. Learning and exploring about castles, he further travels to the historic town Obidos.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Nicosia, the capital of the Republic of Cyprus is also its cultural heartbeat. Sabrina realizes this, as she sets out to unravel the stories of the largest city in Cyprus while being treated to a bath in a Hammam, which was formerly a church.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Great World Hotels Desroches 1
programme.desc: Seychelles is a country of pristine white sandy beaches and turquoise waters that harbour colourful coral reefs and bountiful marine life. Travel enthusiast, Freishia Bomanbehram comes to this tropical paradise looking for fun and relaxation. As she tucks into fresh seafood, goes snorkeling and tries out some catch and release fishing, she realizes that Seychelles has ruined her for all other beach holidays.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Bucket List Gyokuro, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty find out different ways to relish Gyokuro tea, one of the highest grades of tea available in Japan, and visit its source.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek travels to Coimbra. Where he visits the Santa Cruz Church, a park and Santa Claire monastery. Concluding with a visit to Coimbra University.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Bucket List Ohana, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty explore Japan’s very own Venice. They also see a garden that is straight out of a fantasy.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Great World Hotels Desroches 2
programme.desc: Seychelles, with its idyllic natural beauty and slow-paced life is the perfect destination to commune with nature. When Freishia visits this cluster of jewels in the Indian Ocean, she chances upon a tortoise feeding pen and her conversation with the team there gives her insights into the efforts taken by the Island Conservation Society to preserve the beauty of Seychelles.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Driek today travels to Porto, surrounded by chapela, monasteries and churches. He visits a Wine cellar and learns about wine production of Portugal.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Backpack Duoro Valley, Portugal
programme.desc: Our host travels to Douro Valley and is seen exploring vineyards and learning about the history behind it. Concluding his journey at Troia and Évora.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Bucket List Qura, Japan
programme.desc: From the swords of the Samurai to hidden Christian churches, Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty get to know some intriguing sides to Japan.

programme.title: Heritage

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Red Bull Soapbox Race 2019 went to Lithuania's second-largest city, Kaunas, and teams behind the hilarious motorless race cars had the time of their lives.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Red Bull Soapbox Race returned to Dallas, Texas, for the first time since 2012. Over the years, vehicles have ranged from realistic replicas to anything the imagination can conjure up.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Creativity reaches new heights at the 2019 Red Bull Soapbox Race in Tokyo, Japan. Catch the most entertaining performances before the racers hurtle down a challenging, obstacle-filled courses.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: A brilliant transformer design, top-notch dancing dads and a flaming witch going down in a blaze of glory won the crowds' hearts in 2019.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Creativity and soapbox building skills improve every year and 2018's races featured some of the best-looking racers yet to wow fans.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: As 2017's fan favourites teach us, two-wheeled designs never work, and everyone loves a pop culture referencing racer – especially if they self-destruct.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Speed wins a Red Bull Soapbox Race, but eccentric design, a big show and bigger crashes win you the crowd. Case in point, 2016's crowd favourites.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: How do win over a Red Bull Soapbox Race crowd? Destroying your racer and the course itself certainly helps, as 2015's highlights prove.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: If you can't build a fast soapbox, you can at least build an fun one to entertain the huge crowds and these were 2014's fan favourites.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: What do flying Italian bagpipes and South Africa's fastest Stone Age racer have in common? They both made the cut among 2018's best Red Bull Soapbox Race runs.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Every year the Red Bull Soapbox racers get faster. In 2017 the gadgets included the fastest musical drum set in history.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Fearless was very much the watch word during 2016's Red Bull Soapbox Races, as these flat out and crash-filled runs from Santiago to Mumbai and Cork show.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Flying bodywork, broken steering, a feuding royal family and some seriously rapid rides star in the highlights from 2015's seven-stop Red Bull Soapbox Race series.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: These are the fearless teams who pushed their soapbox racers to the limits to smash the speed limits and sometimes the track markers in 2014's races.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: From a rapid UFO to a seriously engineered vintage airliner and real life unicorn, 2018's top soapbox designs really flew down the track.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Not every genius and lovingly crafted design translates into a stable soapbox, as 2017's creative but crash-heavy highlights show.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Nothing less than infinity and beyond was enough for 2016's pop culture-inspired top soapbox design wizards... or at least the finish line.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: From a beautifully engineered steampunk dragon to uncanny Indiana Jones tribute and a truly genius Albert Einstein soapbox, these were 2015's top racers.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Building fast racer is only part of the magic Red Bull Soapbox Race formula: it's also got to look good and these were 2014's hottest designs.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 2019's best crashes and smashes
programme.desc: To win in Red Bull Soapbox Race, first you've got to finish. This is not easy for these hard-crashing teams from 2019's championship.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 2018's best crashes and smashes
programme.desc: Skinny wheels, a narrow wheelbase and a tall chassis are a recipe for big soapbox racing crashes and 2018's biggest spills are the proof.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 2017's best crashes and smashes
programme.desc: Get the first aid kits ready because 2017's crash-reel includes some Hollywood action film-worthy smashes that undoubtedly stung a bit.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 2016's best crashes and smashes

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 2015's best crashes and smashes

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 2014's best crashes and smashes

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race

programme.title: Kade Edwards destroys Dyfi Bike Park
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kade Edwards destroys Dyfi Bike Park

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny kicks off the big wave season at Jaws, facing the risks that come with his pursuit of progression, then Maui water safety bands together after fires ravage the town of Lahaina.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Kai Lenny surfs the same swell at both Jaws and Mavericks, then confronts the risks vs rewards of big wave surfing after suffering a serious injury at Pipeline, the most dangerous wave in the world.

programme.title: Life of Kai
programme.desc: Surf brothers Kai and Ridge Lenny relive their epic XXL wave ride at Maui's Jaws surf spot, and Kai lets us go BTS to take a look at his state-of-the-art surf equipment testing.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: After a breakthrough comp season in 2021, Natalia Grossman became the first American in 20 years to be the IFSC Climbing World Cup champion. Now, she's in the unfamiliar position of having to defend her title.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 Burning the flame part 1

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 Burning the flame part 2
programme.desc: With a fleeting weather window and the season coming to a close, Babsi Zangerl and Jacopo Larcher must conquer countless hard pitches in freezing temps to finish what they started.

programme.title: Why Red Bull Must Escape their "Vicious Cycle" to Win Both F1 Titles in 2024
programme.desc: Compared to the opening half of the season, where Max Verstappen utterly dominated the F1 grid, Red Bull has had less success - especially highlighted in the Italian Grand Prix where Verstappen finished 6th, Sergio Perez in 8th. But is this purely McLaren, Ferrari and Mercedes improving beyond the RB20's capabilities, or has Red Bull taken a step back, between Adrian Newey's announced departure and other problems in the team? Bryn Lucas discusses all this and more with Jake Boxall-Legge and Filip Cleeren in the wake of Red Bull's lackluster results in Monza.

programme.title: Le Mans Cup
programme.sub-title: S2024 : E04 MLMC 2024: Round 4 - Spa Francorchamps Highlights
programme.desc: Catch all the highlights from the fourth round of the Michelin Le Mans Cup at Spa Francorchamps.

programme.title: Macau Grand Prix
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E01 70th Macau GP: Macau GT Cup - FIA GT World Cup
programme.desc: Watch the 70th Macau Grand Prix Macau GT Cup 16 lap race as it happens.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: Adrian Newey Confirmed - Are Aston Martin Set for F1 Success?
programme.desc: Despite it being possibly F1's worst kept secret in recent years, today Aston Martin announced that Adrian Newey will join the F1 team, starting March 2025 as Managing Technical Partner as well a shareholder - for an eye-watering amount of money too. But does Adrian Newey complete Lawrence Stroll's dream lineup for Aston Martin to succeed in F1 and fight for championship titles? Jon Noble and Ben Hunt chat at Aston's facilities.

programme.title: Hypercar’s Golden Age – WEC 2023 Season Review
programme.desc: The much anticipated 2023 World Endurance season promised larger grids and more manufacturer support as teams like Ferrari, Peugeot, Porsche and Cadillac all joined the Hypercar class in hopes of challenging Toyota for top honors. While Ferrari managed to make history in winning the centenary running of Le Mans, it was a season of learnings up and down the grid as Toyota won their 5th straight Drivers and Manufacturers Championships.

programme.title: F1's Top 10 Ferrari Drivers of All Time
programme.desc: Ferrari tops all the major Formula 1 statistics, and by some margin. It has more race wins, more drivers’ titles and more constructors’ crowns than any other team. That means picking out the top 10 Ferrari F1 drivers is incredibly difficult, with some top drivers and world champions missing the cut. But we’ve given it a go.

programme.title: Why Red Bull Must Escape their "Vicious Cycle" to Win Both F1 Titles in 2024
